listing.listing_description: Burj Gate Penthouse is a spectacular apartment in the center of Dubai, an easy walk or drive from the city's famous opera, fountain, and mall, and about five kilometers from Jumeirah Beach. The penthouse enjoys breathtaking views of the sea and skyline (including the iconic Burj Khalifa building), while exquisitely furnished living areas offer a comfortable private haven for dining and relaxation. Accommodations for eight adults and two children make this vacation rental an ideal choice for families, destination wedding guests, and business travelers.High ceilings and ample windows infuse the apartment's living areas with abundant natural light and lofty, seemingly infinite vistas. A sumptuous salon welcomes afternoon tea or evening cocktails, and the adjoining dining table seats ten on beautiful baby-blue chairs. The kitchen has a vintage, mid-century modern feel, contemporary gourmet appliances, and a window bar serving the dining table and salon. A lovely floating staircase leads upstairs, where a second lounge forms a quiet sanctuary for private downtime. The villa's décor feels at once fresh and classically elegant, blending modern chic with touches of Arabian magnificence in the gold accents, stunning wallpapers, and delightful textiles.There are two bedroom on each floor of the penthouse—three with king beds and one with two twins—while an additional bunkroom sleeps two children. On the main floor, the master suite and primary guest suite both enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the upper-level bedrooms share a bathroom between them. The views from all the bedrooms are truly spectacular.From the lobby of the building, you're an easy walk or quick drive (about one kilometer) to the Dubai Fountain on Burj Khalifa Lake, the largest choreographed fountain in the world, as well as the Dubai Opera and Dubai Mall (also the world's largest). Haute cuisine dining and high-end shopping surround you, while the white sands of Jumeirah Beach on the Persian Gulf are just five kilometers away. Proximity to Dubai International Airport allows for easy arrival and departure.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This sun-kissed palatial villa offers a range of features unmatched elsewhere on the Palm Jumeirah. The grand gates, towering pillars and regal facade will usher you in with royal style. The only district home with a private beach, pool and master ensuite featuring a hot tub and sauna; the villa’s myriad rooms, shaded terrace and welcoming bedrooms are close to downtown Dubai, fine golfing, and the famous marina.Tread the warm stone terrace that’s been heated by the golden morning light, before slipping into this home’s luxurious pool. From here, take in the white sand, swaying palms and sapphire blue water of the Palm district, with the unique silhouette of the Atlantis The Palm Hotel visible in the distance. As garden trees shade comfortable exterior seats, lush lawns invite strolls and relaxed conversation. Solid marble floors and extravagant chandeliers infuse the huge living room with a sense of grandeur, while the dining room exhibits shining elegance. The pool table, provided kayaks, and socializing around the fire pit are all popular options.From the Dubai Paradise Villa, a vast number of international restaurants are just a short drive away. Renowned beachside bars and stylish lounges are also sprinkled around the locality. Tee off in the pleasant sea breeze at the Emirates golf club, or take to the downtown to experience high-end shopping options beyond your wildest imagination. For a truly stimulating afternoon, visit the Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo, complete with underwater walkways and diving amongst fascinating marine life.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With a spacious open-concept layout, spectacular city views, and accommodations for ten, this downtown penthouse is perfect for a family vacation or business event. Located in a prestigious neighborhood, just outside of Dubai’s major tourist attractions and business district, this downtown apartment makes navigation a breeze. Within thirty kilometers, you’ll be able to find world-class golf, shopping, nightlife, and pristine beachfront.Decorated in elegant white, with a minimalistic influence, designers of this penthouse spared no expense when creating the luxurious atmosphere within its glass walls. The living room is massive, with plenty of designer furniture to seat everyone in the group. If you’re hosting an event or dinner soiree, the living room has more than enough space. If you’re feeling like a quiet night in, curl up on the sofa in the media room for a movie night with the family. In the kitchen, the bright space is decked out with high-end appliances and functional workspace.Whether you’re having a full dinner in the formal dining area, or a quick coffee at the table nestled into the corner window, you’re going to have an amazing view of the city. You could also have that morning coffee out on the furnished balcony for an even better view. After, start your day off with a quick swim or workout in the building’s facilities before you head out. There’s also an office/library, media room, prayer room, and pool table.Just a quick ten-minute drive from your downtown penthouse, you’ll be able to access The Dubai Mall, one of the world’s largest shopping and entertainment destinations. While you’re out exploring, you’re sure to find plenty of unique shops, cafes, bars, and restaurants throughout Dubai’s downtown core. For a little fun in the sun, visit Jumeirah Beach. Loved by locals and tourists alike, the white sandy beach, crystal clear waters, and vibrant atmosphere of Jumeirah Beach are a must-see on your next Luxury Retreats vacation.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: As far as beach vacations go, it doesn’t get much better than a beachfront property on Dubai’s extremely prestigious Palm Jumeirah. Easily one of the most sought-after vacation destinations on the planet, the Palm Jumeirah is always high on “Best Beach” year-end lists. Another amazing feature of Signature Villa’s location is its proximity to Dubai’s vibrant downtown and marina districts. You can have the tranquil oasis you desire, without giving up quick and easy access to the city, should you decide to venture away from the white sandy shores on your private beachfront.Signature Villa features a breezy open-concept design with plenty of openings to allow fresh ocean air and natural sunlight to fill the bright interior space. Exciting decor, like accent walls, locally inspired artwork, and an eclectic color palette allows each room within signature’s walls to have a unique feel, which comes in handy when hosting large groups.With five luxurious bedrooms and a kids bunk room, Signature Villa is perfect for a family vacation, a beach getaway with friends, or a relaxing retreat with colleagues. Features like television and Wi-Fi will keep you connected, while the swimming pool, alfresco shower, and beachfront will invite you to experience the Palm Jumeirah’s breezy beach freedom. At dinner, there’s formal dining inside, with seating for ten, and an elegant atmosphere to enjoy casual meals with the family or host associates in lavish fashion.Look towards downtown, and you’ll be able to see many of Dubai’s notable architectural features, highlighted within Dubai’s iconic skyline. Features like the Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest building, are actually common when you’re in Dubai. You’ll also be able to visit the world’s largest mall and largest human-made port in the Marina District. Beachfront bars, fine dining, world-class shopping, and exciting nightlife are all easily accessible, as are historical attractions like floating restaurants and ancient bridges, in the historical district, Bur Dubai.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Beachfront on Dubai’s Palm Jumeirah is some of the world’s most sought-after real-estate and consistently ranks among the “world’s best beaches” in various travel magazines. To vacation here is truly a unique experience, as you are located in a private, pristine beach community, yet minutes from the bustling metropolis of downtown Dubai. With four luxurious bedrooms and an ample amount of common space, Palm Dream is perfect for a family vacation, getaway with friends, or a breezy retreat with colleagues.Thoughtfully decorated, Palm Dreams is not like most beachfront vacation homes, it has an authenticity and character that is undeniable. The bright yellow couch in the living, although that may sound scary to some, works perfectly in this eclectic atmosphere. Chandelier lighting, ornate fixtures, and striking accent walls are just the tip of the iceberg when exploring this elegant interior. No detail, no matter how fine, has been spared in Palm Dream’s design.Palm Dream’s spacious interior is luxuriously appointed with state of the art electronics, designer furniture, elegant fixtures, and eclectic works of art. The kitchen is fully-equipped with stainless steel appliances and plenty of functional countertop workspace. The formal dining area, with seating for eight, is lavishly decorated and exciting space to enjoy your meals. The villa also comes with Wi-Fi and television. Outside on the terrace, the swimming pool is the perfect place to beat the afternoon heat. Surrounding the pool, you’ll find an alfresco shower, sun loungers, a barbecue, and an incredible ocean view.There is no shortage of attractions in Dubai, in fact, many of their recent tourism endeavors are world-record holding feats of modern construction. The largest mall in the world, The Dubai Mall, is just a few kilometers from your beachfront home. There, you’ll find world-class shopping, fine dining, a movie theatre, and more. For a more relaxing, outdoor shopping experience, visit the Marina District and stroll through the beachfront bars, fine dining establishments, and vibrant nightlife of the boardwalk.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Perfect for a wedding or renewing your vows then celebrating on the large pooled terrace.The villa on the hillside of Mykonos boasts one large villa and several smaller guest houses with room enough for the whole family. It is the perfect villa for any celebration as it can accommodate up to 24 adults and 3 children.The terrace, many verandas, and open areas are perfect for entertaining a large group and dining al fresco. Starlight Villa becomes magical in the evenings with underlit pools, soft candles, and lanterns. The view of the Aegean is panoramic from the terrace and gorgeous from every room day or night. A study in white, the villas are open-air, luxurious, and comfortable. Elia beach is a 5-minute drive away. Concierge service is available 24/7 for arranging entertainment, staff, flowers, or getting a hard to get table reservation.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to a jewel box of a residence at Empress Villa. This stunning waterfront estate in Dubai boasts beautiful interiors, relaxed outdoor areas and five bedrooms perfect for up to ten friends or family members. Its setting on the beach of the Palm Jumeirah puts you close to shopping, dining, family-friendly attractions and more during your holiday.Enjoy the beachfront location—and views of the glittering Dubai skyline—from private outdoor living areas with loungers in the sun, a barbecue and a swimming pool. In the evenings, start some friendly competition around the villa’s pool table, or unwind with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi.Bold colors and glam furnishings give the inside of this luxury vacation rental a bijou appeal. Crimson and mustard play off gold-toned accents in the living room, while in the dining room, cool shades of turquoise and royal blue dominate. The fully equipped kitchen may be less colorful with its white cabinetry, but a sleek round breakfast table makes it equally inviting.The rich hues continue in the villa’s five bedrooms. There are three bedrooms with king beds, two of which have en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each and en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, an additional bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and separate entrance is also available.A stay at Empress Villa puts you at the heart of all that Dubai has to offer. Spend days teeing off at the nearby Emirates Golf Club, browsing the boutiques in the Dubai Marina District or the Dubai Mall (the world’s largest), or making family memories at the city’s water and theme parks or the zoo. Finish with dinner and drinks in a honeymoon-worthy setting overlooking the city at one of the Palm Jumeirah’s waterfront bars and restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Elegance in an exclusive location gets a dash of whimsy at Palm Grove. A six-bedroom vacation rental on Dubai’s iconic Palm Jumeirah, this luxury residence offers a private pool, private beach access and surprisingly playful touches in its inspired decor. Reserve the villa for a sunny holiday with family or a chic getaway with friends.A terrace with a pool, lounging and dining areas, and steps to the beach makes it easy to take full advantage of the villa’s waterfront setting. When you’re done playing outside, a wine cellar, TV and Wi-Fi are waiting to entertain indoors. For your comfort and convenience, the villa also has air conditioning and laundry facilities.While polished tile floors and refined furnishings set a tone of sleek sophistication in the living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen, colorful accents show a sense of humor, too. High-contrast tones of pink and turquoise in plush fabrics and vibrant prints add playful personality. But there’s a practical side, too; the kitchen has a breakfast bar and an all-important espresso machine.The pops of color continue in the villa’s stylish bedrooms. There are four with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, two of which have their own balconies, and one with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. For parties traveling with a younger crowd, there’s also a children’s room with a bunk bed and shared bathroom.A stay at Palm Grove puts you close to the best of the Palm Jumeirah, where you can find everything from food trucks dishing out fare on the boardwalk to world-class restaurants serving honeymoon-worthy meals. If you’re traveling with kids, stop by the Aqua Adventure Waterpark; otherwise, hit up the nearby Dubai Marina area for brunch. And it’s never a bad idea to treat yourself to a little something at Mall of the Emirates.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This stunning luxury villa is situated on the western shore of the Greek island of Paros, an easy walk from Krios Beach and less than three kilometers from Parikia. With the impressive, luminous presence and voluminous, sculptural form of classical Cycladian architecture, the villa evokes the antique beauty of the Agean Sea while rooting you in the timeless present. The ample pool terrace and beautiful interiors enjoy panoramic vistas of the sea and neighboring islands, while six beautiful bedrooms provide tranquil sanctuary for families and groups of friends.The sunbathed terrace and shaded veranda invite you to dreamy hours under the Aegean sun and stars. Awaken yourself with a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and savor the brilliant noonday light on elegant chaises longues. Returning from a trip to the beach, rinse off in the outdoor shower and relish alfresco meals from the traditional barbeque grill. The sparkling pool, blue window shutters, and lush gardens offer a gorgeous counterpoint to the villa's immaculate white facades.Multiple sets of French doors infuse the interiors with natural sunlight and soothing air. The living room invites you to kindle the fireplace and sip delicious Greek wine or aperitifs, before gathering around the dining table for home-cooked feasts. The open kitchen blends a bucolic ambiance with high-end appliances and includes an island table for serving breakfast or meze. The décor throughout the home balances rustic, naturalistic elements and choice touches of contemporary artistry.The main house features five bedrooms—three with king beds, two with queens—while a separate guesthouse includes a double-size bed. The master suite enjoys an ensuite bathroom, walk-in closet, and private terrace with spectacular views. One of the king beds can be converted into dual twins.Villa Delion offers a fine equilibrium of privacy and convenience on legendary Paros. About eight hundred paces from Krios Beach, you're also within walking distance or an easy drive of Marstelo Beach. At nearby Parikia, the island's capital, discover the famed Byzantine architecture of Panagia Ekatontapiliani or catch a boat to explore the Cyclades archipelago.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Gorgeous beachfront awaits in Dubai's most prestigious beach community, The Palm Jumeirah. With sandy shores just outside your back door and an endless supply of Dubai's world-renown attractions just minutes away, you'll fall in love with the ease and convenience of Jumeirah Retreat's amazing location. Perfect for a family vacation, get away with friends, or a beachy-business trip with colleagues, this luxurious five-bedroom will show you what it's like to live in one of the World's premier beach communities.Take some time to explore the fine details of Jumeirah Retreat's interior, and you will not be disappointed. In fact, very few vacation rentals have this level of thoughtful adornment, showcasing the very best of native decor, as well as creating a welcoming environment for those who haven't visited Dubai before. The designer furniture is plush, fit for royalty. The art on the walls, the lighting, trim, and fixtures are all intricately detailed. There is chandelier lighting in many of the rooms, providing a glamorous sophistication to each space The kitchen features restaurant caliber appliances, an espresso machine, and a spacious layout. And, each bedroom has an en-suite bathroom.At dinner, Jumeirah Retreat has an elegant dining space with seating for ten guests. The villa comes equipped with television, Wi-Fi, and a washer/dryer. Outside, you'll love cooling off in the swimming pool, relaxing in a sun lounger, and gazing upon the ocean view. And, just a few steps from the back door, the beachfront begins.Just outside The Palm Jumeirah's gates, the action-packed city of Dubai begins. If you're interested in shopping or a movie, the Dubai Mall is the World's largest retail-entertainment destination. If there's a golfer in the group, Emirates Golf Club is a must-play for any golf aficionado. The downtown core is just twenty-five kilometers from home. Once there, you'll have an overwhelming choice of restaurants, bars, boutique shops, and vibrant nightlife. And, if you're traveling with kids, there are four theme parks within thirty-kilometers, and the Dubai Zoo is nearby as well.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in Dubai's coveted beachfront community, The Palm Jumeirah, this four bedroom luxury villa possesses highly sought after vacation features. With beachfront access, a private atmosphere, an incredible ocean view, and its location just minutes from downtown, Sea View Palm Villa is the perfect home base for a dynamic vacation. Perfect for a family get-together, vacation with friends or a couples retreat, Sea View's spacious interior, and functional outdoor spaces are ready for any occasion.Throughout Sea View's interior, you'll find several splashes of golden accents on furniture, art, wall decor, and textures. Setting a prestigious tone with highly detailed decoration, this beachfront remains breezy and inviting, while celebrating the finer things in life. Bright colors, accent walls, and gorgeous designer furniture create an exciting interior vibe that you're sure to appreciate. And, each bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and king-sized bed.Spend your mornings on the terrace, enjoying an espresso at the patio set, gazing out to sea. Or, maybe you'd rather have that beverage on the beach, it's just a few steps away. At lunch, fire up the barbecue and grill up something fresh from a local market. At dinner, invite your guests to the formal dining area. With seating for eight and a fully equipped kitchen, hosting is easy. And, after a relaxing day on the sand, cool off in the refreshing infinity pool.Dubai is a unique vacation destination, as very few cities offer as wide a variety of attractions. Nearby, you'll find the Dubai Marina District, with a seaside stretch of fine dining establishments and high-end fashion houses. For more shopping, visit The Dubai Mall, the World's largest mall. If there's a golfer in your party, Emirates Golf Club is just ten-kilometers from your beachfront oasis. And, if you're traveling with children, Dubai has several water/theme parks, and a world-class zoo all within a few kilometers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This spectacular villa is perched along the beach in the Palm Jumeirah of Dubai, an extraordinary island extending from the city's downtown area into the Persian Gulf. Situated on Al Khalas (Frond B), this vacation rental blends beachfront serenity with convenient proximity to the island's famed restaurants and nightlife, while also being an easy drive from Emirates Golf Club and Dubai Marina. Ample exterior and interior living areas enjoy expansive views of the sea and the Atlantis Hotel, while high-end amenities and splendid décor create an exquisite private haven for relishing time with loved ones. Four spacious bedroom suites along with a kids' bunkroom accommodate families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.Step from your terrace onto the sands of your private stretch of beach, and plunge into the sea or stroll amid the gorgeous light of morning or sunset. Enjoy long hours by the villa's pool, sunbathing on loungers and floating in the refreshing water. Relax in the outdoor lounge, savoring cool drinks and gazing at the skyline of this unparalleled city.Towering arched windows illuminate the interior salon, where the white walls accentuate the exquisite, gallery-worthy objets d'art. Enjoy evening aperitifs while watching your favorite shows, and repair to the lovely dining room for feasts around the ten-person table with sea views.The villa features three king bedrooms, one room with two twin-size beds, and a bunkroom for kids. Sumptuous bedding and high-end bathroom fixtures offer contemporary comforts, while the tastefully rich palette of the rooms' décor evokes the splendors of ancient Arabia. Two of the bedrooms open to terraces, and the master suite includes a jetted tub in its bathroom.The Palm Jumerirah is a luxury world unto itself, with fabulous restaurants, bars, hotels, and beaches within minutes of your front door. Venturing into the city's downtown area, enjoy the extraordinary beauty and scale of Dubai Fountain, or relish a shopping excursion at Dubai Mall. Proximity to Dubai International Airport makes this vacation rental a convenient choice for business retreats.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Get a sunny beach holiday and glamorous city break in one at Palm Waves. Set on the exclusive shores of the Palm Jumeirah, this six-bedroom luxury residence boasts a waterfront location and panoramic views of the Dubai skyline. Reserve this vacation rental for a getaway with family or a stylish escape with friends.Savor the sunshine from beachfront living areas with a private swimming pool, loungers, a barbecue and an al-fresco dining table—or follow the steps down to the sandy beach itself. If you’ve spent the day shopping or exploring, spend the evening unwinding with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi.Metallic finishes, pops of bright color and a free-flowing layout give the villa plenty of sophisticated appeal. There’s ample room to stretch out on a unique two-sided sofa in the living room, and the adjacent dining room seats ten in vibrant purple chairs. The kitchen is fully equipped and even has an espresso machine so you can start each day off right.Palm Waves has four bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with two twin beds and an en-suite bathroom. The sixth bedroom is a children’s room with a bunk bed and shared bathroom—perfect for older kids who want their own space for sleepover-style fun.Thanks to its location on the Palm Jumeirah complex, Palm Waves is close to everything from food trucks on the boardwalk to five-star restaurants serving honeymoon-worthy fare. If you’re traveling with kids, be sure to stop by the Aqua Adventure Waterpark; if not, sit down to a leisurely brunch in the nearby Dubai Marina neighborhood or indulge in some serious shopping at the world-class Mall of the Emirates. If you’re up for adventure, you can spend your days kayaking or skydiving and your nights dancing to top DJs at beach clubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Just 10 minutes’ walk from Megali Ammos beach and 15 minutes from the ancient town of Mykonos, this spectacular 5-bedroom Greek villa commands sweeping views of the bay and town from its elevated position. Ideal for large and multiple families, up to 10 people will find rest and relaxation here and a pet dog may be permitted on request. Two villa staff live separately on-site and are available to cook, clean and run errands as required.Every facet of this gorgeous villa has been designed with your comfort and ease in mind and it’s been rated as one of the Top 20 great Greek Island villas by Condé Nast Traveler. Spectacular views of the sunset, harbor and Mykonos town are showcased by huge multiple windows and there are a host of secret corners and generous terraces to sit and soak up the sun, read or just take in the vista. Outdoors a turquoise pool offers a cool respite from the heat of the sun, and is softly illuminated by night. Take a seat at the bar and order your favorite cocktail before raising your glass to the setting sun and dining alfresco on one of the shaded terraces.Indoors a huge dining table with bench seats and fabulous views is the perfect place to cluster with friends and family for delicious meals and lively conversation before gathering around the open stone fireplace to plan the next day or watch television. Alternatively there’s another breakfast table in the homely kitchen. Natural materials take pride of place here and wood and stone make frequent appearances.Three of the villa’s five delightful bedrooms are served by lovely en-suite bathrooms with tubs and rain showers while the two bedrooms in the Family Suite are ideal for a family of four and share a bathroom between them. Rustic stone vanities and unique showers are some of the quirky features that make this place so appealing.Feeling energetic? Your villa is only 1km from the nearest gym and tennis courts. If you need groceries you only have to drive for 5 minutes or you can ask staff to go on your behalf. Megali Ammos beach is a 10 minute stroll and a 15 minute walk will take you to historic Mykonos Town. Your closest airport is 2 km away and it’s 3 km to the nearest port.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stone and whitewashed stucco soak up the Aegean sun at this traditionally inspired modern home on Mykonos. The villa is built into the hillside, so the rays sweep across neighboring hills and sparkle on the stretch of sea that’s visible from the partly shaded pool terrace and living room. Watch the sunset from your private patio or from the restaurant on the beach in Elia, an 8-minute walk away.Spend sun-splashed days on a lounger by the pool, retreating to the shade of an alfresco sitting area and dining table for 10 or taking a swim if it gets too warm. A Nespresso machine will help start holiday mornings on the right note, while a wine cooler, smart TV with satellite reception, and Sonos sound system will help end evenings on a relaxed one.Beamed ceilings and smooth floors in tones of white and cream make the interiors of this vacation rental feel bright and airy—with some assistance from the rows of doors leading to the terrace and looking out to the sea. Take a seat on the pair of sofas in the living room or at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with queen beds and 3 bedrooms with 2 twin beds each, where you have the option to convert the twins to a king bed. All 5 bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning, and ocean views.Since the villa is set just off the main road to the beach, it’s a short walk or drive to a family-friendly stretch of golden sand, where you can splash in the water and then relive your honeymoon—or make new memories in Greece—at the oceanfront restaurant. Drive 10 minutes to Kalafati to try out windsurfing or another water sport on the town’s broad, sandy beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With entrancing views of the southern coast, this Mykonos villa offers sunlit calm and subtle glamor. A naturally-inspired infinity pool upends expectations, with stone-dashed exteriors, broad terrace and classic Greek touches adding real character to the home. Boasting rugged scenery, crisply-designed interior and 10 ensuite bedrooms; sandy beaches and Mykonos’s famed nightlife are close by.From the air-conditioned living room and stylish sofas of Carmen, guests can recline and plan a relaxing day on this sunny Mediterranean island. Take breakfast under the nautical-theme sun shape of the open terrace, sipping on fresh juice as the sea breeze flows under the shade and through the exterior seating. The soft lighting and modern appliances of the kitchen ensure that whipping up a quick meal with local island ingredients is an easy task, while the uncluttered, deeply comfortable bedrooms feature pleasant ensuite bathrooms - ensuring the heat of the day can be washed away in refreshing privacy. Guests will appreciate easy access to some of the island’s beaches from Carmen, with the likes of Elia Beach being just a short drive away. Peaceful strolls along nearby mountain trails will pass by quiet hilltop churches, while local restaurants offer unique Mykonos meze dishes, which are ideal with a chilled beer or a glass of ouzo. The happening bars and clubs of the main town are closer than you think, offering great partying all night along as well as late-night dining and live music.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel the sun’s white-hot heat beating down and bouncing off the white and stone villa. The cooling aqua blue waters of the infinity pool beckon. Music drifts and floats along with an exotic mix of suntan lotions. Ice cubes rattle against glasses. It’s the start of a summer day in this hillside villa just 2.6 miles from Mykonos City.Villa Fleur de Sel pays homage to the multi-level luxury of the outdoors. Panoramic rooftop views of the island and ocean are more than selfie-worthy. A few steps down, hammocks and swings hang from beams next to windows looking out on ocean views, perfect for reading or napping.A sizeable thatched-roof pergola provides shade and couches, with an outdoor kitchen and alfresco dining area sharing the space. Platforms and loungers are everywhere for serious sunbathers. Indoors the decor is open, airy, and minimal. Most rooms directly face or access the patio and pool. Spend cooler evenings around the stone fireplace in the spacious open living/dining/kitchen area.It’s a 12- minute walk to the beach, every night is a party at Tropicana Mykonos Club where you can dance until dawn. Try to visit Little Venice famous for the windmills, cafes, and bars. Delos is not far from Mykonos and is considered the holy island of Greece. It’s a World Heritage Site.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Surround yourself with quintessential Greek island scenery at Great Mystique. Despite its name, it’s no mystery what gives this Mykonos vacation rental its appeal, from its charming architecture to its sunset views over the sea. Expansive outdoor living areas, six bedrooms and the option to book a sister villa make this property ideal for groups of friends on holiday together or an extended family.Great Mystique sits amid manicured gardens that slope gently down the hillside toward the sea. It opens to a huge water-facing terrace with an infinity pool, an exercise area and ping-pong table, and a covered entertaining area with a wood-fired barbecue, sound system and a dining table. After watching the sunset, step inside to unwind with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi.White stucco walls and beamed ceilings give this luxury residence plenty of traditional charm. The spacious living room, dining area and fully equipped kitchen get a bright, airy feel from a fresh all-white color scheme, wide doors to the terrace and perfectly positioned windows affording panoramic sea views.Great Mystique has three bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a private balcony, and two bedrooms with queen beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and open to an outdoor space, whether a balcony or terrace.Popular with honeymooners, families on sun getaways and groups of friends looking to dance the night away in its clubs, Mykonos has something for everyone. And from the villa’s location in the Agios Lazaros area, it’s easy to explore the island. Drive to Ornos Beach for a quiet afternoon on the sand or a stroll around this picturesque fishing village, or to the famed shores of Psarou Beach. Spend a fascinating day at the museums or a memorable night out in the clubs of Mykonos town, also a short drive from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting just above Elia Beach, Oleandri is a brand new private property with a stunning view over the bay that stretches over the turquoise waters of the Aegean Sea. This panoramic location is within a short drive from Elia town, while the village of Ano Mera with its traditional Greek restaurants and taverns is also close by. Inhale the sweet fragrance of geraniums mingled with bougainvillea as you coast your way through the sheer white abodes framed in this Mediterranean paradise called Mykonos.An ample terrace is located in the front of this luxury property with its infinity swimming pool seeming to blend into the sea below. The pool area features plenty of stylish sun beds. The large pergola provides shade just next to the pool, covering the chic outdoor lounge area and alfresco dining space both positioned to make the utmost of the panorama. Indoors, you will find a home entertainment unit and Wi-Fi. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The imprint of Cycladic architecture is evident throughout the interiors of this stunning vacation rental with the grand use of white surfaces, the lower level location of most of the bedrooms and the separate studio do justice to the most typical features of Mykonos island residences. These traditional roots are enhanced with tasteful decor showcasing refined textiles as well as iconic and handmade furniture. The fully equipped kitchen features direct access to the terrace.Five exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. One of the suites is located in a separate guest house for a little extra privacy. The four suites in the main house all provide air conditioning. Two suites offer direct access to the pool deck, and one includes a private balcony. Get the vacation in Greece you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Oleandri makes a great bet for guests who cherish great taste while being close to the beach. The site is perfect for a family holiday or a group of friends. The sheer beauty and picturesque environs also make Oleandri a favorite spot for exclusive weddings, birthdays and other special events. Enter an enchanting land where luxury and tradition comingle for an idyllic getaway experience!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated in Aleomandra, on an elevated plane immediately above the Bay of Ornos on the Greek island of Mykonos, lies a state-of-the-art luxurious vacation home with a charming moniker: South Cove Dream. A massive five-bedroom estate capable of hosting up to ten overnight guests, its elevated position provides breathtaking panoramic views of the bay and the Aegean Sea. Strategically positioned between Ornos Beach and Mykonos Town, South Cove Dream provides endless opportunities to bask in the mellow Mediterranean way.South Cove Dream is always kept in shipshape order with daily housekeeping service. The infinity swimming pool that seems to blend with the waters of the Aegean Sea is enriched by a surrounding terrace equipped with sunbeds and parasols as well as an electric awning, allowing guests to select their preferred amount of shade. The terrace also provides a furnished verandah, pergola, alfresco dining tables and a full bar that includes a sound system, making the terrace a scenic venue for an aperitif. Additionally, the villa has satellite television and Wi-Fi.The indoor spaces of South Cove Dream have an ultra-modern vibe, employing a cutting-edge minimalist decor style and a color scheme of mainly white with hints of bright blue like the ever-present surrounding sea. The living room is alluring, adorned with high-end imported furniture and contemporary modern artworks. A fully equipped kitchen is designed to make mealtimes a breeze and has convenient French doors that open up to the terrace and alfresco dining area.The bedchambers of South Cove Dream embody luxury and comfort in both design and practicality. Each bedroom boasts a double bed, en-suite bathroom, separate climate control and delightful sea views. The master bedroom even offers a second en-suite bathroom as well as a separate living area and direct access to the terrace, while the remaining five rooms each have direct access to the outdoors.Beaches are everywhere on the island of Mykonos, many of them within walking distance of South Cove Dream. Excursions into the local culture are plentiful, with many local tour guides are very enthusiastic to show visitors the best of the island. One of the most unique spots on the island is the medieval-era village of Ano Mera, replete with ancient sites and architectural marvels, not to mention lovely taverns and pastry shops. Enjoy your holiday with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Alisahnea is a stunning oceanfront property located just steps away from the secluded sandy beach of Kapari in Greece. Just minutes from Agios Ioannis Beach and Mykonos, come escape to an idyllic area of the Mediterranean where boats jet along the stunning azure waters as you are fanned by the gentle sea breeze. Enter an enchanting land where luxury and tradition comingle for a perfect getaway experience!An impressive L-shaped, saltwater, infinity swimming pool stretches around the large terrace area that has been built on two levels and offers wide sun bathing and recreational space. The pergola offers a large alfresco dining area with a wood fire barbeque and a direct entrance to the kitchen. Inside, you will find satellite television, a DVD player and Wi-Fi. Your reservation at this private holiday home includes daily housekeeping.This vacation rental’s grand living room opens directly onto the formal dining area while also leading to the pergola. The open kitchen is fully equipped and well positioned for either indoor or outdoor entertaining. The cozy yet elegant decor of the house features white and wooden classic furniture, which blends harmoniously with the Cycladic architecture. The predominantly white furnishings and walls give the space an almost otherworldly character.Six lovely bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. Three bedrooms provide direct access to the terrace with ocean views, and the studio suite offers a separate garden entrance. Five bedrooms provide en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Sleep soundly amid the quiet ocean surroundings and wake up to the vivid colors each new day!The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics and fine amenities provide guests of Alisahnea with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. This villa makes a great bet for guests who appreciate great taste while being close to the beach. The site is perfect for a family or a group of friends. The sheer beauty and picturesque environs also make Alisahnea a favorite spot for exclusive weddings, birthdays and other special events. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled on the Makria Miti hillside, amongst olive trees and indigenous bushes you will find the wonderful Villa Bueno. Reflecting the classic sugar cube architecture of the Greek islands, Bueno looks down a gentle slope towards the azure sea below. The villa design incorporates two distinct units, ideal for sharing between families and large groups. A salt-water infinity pool provides the main focus at the front of Villa Bueno, and if you fancy the real thing, it’s just a five-minute amble down to the beach.Rippling in the gentle breeze, the topaz water of the infinity pool is the center of attention as you step out of the French windows fronting Villa Bueno. The surrounding loungers are at your service - stretch out in the blissful sunshine with a good book, or maybe take a snooze. Umbrellas are on hand for when it’s time for shade. Fringed by gorgeous pink bougainvillaea flowers, the picturesque outdoor lounge is a lovely place to sit for a chat and a refreshing drink. Meal times are a treat as you gather around the shady outdoor table, enjoying the dazzling vista off the South coast of Paros.An elegant, airy space, the living room subtly references a seaside influence. A delightful scattering of marine themed ornaments complement sandy colors and driftwood style furniture. The homely, country style kitchen is a cheerful place to prepare your meals, and extremely well-equipped. An eclectic mix of hanging decorations sits above the practical kitchen island, and in front of the adorable shuttered windows.Shared between the ground, lower levels, and the guesthouse, Bueno hosts a twin and four double bedrooms. The twin room is fit for a princess, four-poster beds framed with pretty pink curtains. Pristine white and sky blue combinations in two of the double rooms foster tranquil evenings and bright, optimistic mornings. Or choose between the playful hot pink, and the soft peachy tones of the final two bedrooms. The en-suite bathrooms are equally as varied in character, yet all brought together by graceful vessel sinks.A pleasant five-minute stroll will take you to a secluded sandy beach. Take a book and listen to the waves lap therapeutically against the shore. For a nature themed day trip, venture further afield to the scenic Butterfly Valley. As the name suggests, among the lush foliage you will find thousands of beautiful butterflies, gracefully fluttering against the bright blue sky. Paros airport is close, just a ten-minute drive away. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend an unforgettable Mykonos holiday with friends and family at the neighboring villas of Kerethium and Astarte. Set just above the sea outside Agios Ioannis and boasting classic Cycladic architecture and a total of eight bedrooms, these two homes are an idyllic backdrop for a reunion, special occasion or even an intimate destination wedding.Your stay includes daily breakfast and either lunch or dinner, served on the terrace at Astarte, as well as housekeeping and linen service. Settle into the island lifestyle with the help of the villas' two saltwater infinity pools and expansive lounge areas, and finish each day with dinner from the wood-fired barbecue at the al-fresco table or a quiet evening by the TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.The traditional architecture of both Kerethium and Astarte will charm from the start, and the bright, comfortable living areas offer plenty of welcoming spots to relax or entertain. Both villas at this luxury vacation rental have airy, white-walled living and dining areas with quaint details like beamed ceilings or a brick-lined hearth. There is a fully equipped kitchen in Kerethium, and a semi-professional kitchen with separate access.There are three bedrooms in Kerethium, plus a private studio that could double as a honeymoon suite, and four bedrooms in Astarte; all eight have en-suite bathrooms. Both Kerethium and Astarte have two bedrooms with queen beds (including the studio at Kerethium), and two bedrooms with double beds.While the property feels tucked away behind large rock formations and a cacti garden, it's only a short drive from the clear waters of Kapari Beach or the livelier oceanfront scene (and incredible sunset views) at Agios Ioannis. You'll find shopping just a few minutes away for any necessities, but there are more boutiques and a range of dining options just a bit farther in Mykonos Town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stone walls frame views of neighboring hillsides sloping seaward at this traditional-looking, modern-feeling Mykonos villa. White walls pinpoint Greek-island design, but the decor takes its cues from mid-century style. A location near Elia means it’s less prone to wind—all the better to enjoy the outdoor living areas—and it’s only 700 meters from the palapa- and taverna-lined sands of Elia Beach.Start sunny days with a coffee at the covered sitting area on the terrace, then bring a book out to a lounger next to a swimming pool with jacuzzi jets. Serve refreshments from the stone bar—which has windows cut out for sea views as you sit there—before heating up the barbecue for dinner at one of the 2 covered alfresco tables.Open the French doors to a great room that stretches the width of the house, featuring a dining table for 8, a living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. Whitewashed beamed ceilings, wood floors, and slipcovered sofas let you know you’re in the Greek islands, while sculptural dining and accent chairs lend a little mod flair.It’s a quick trip down to Elia Beach, one of the longest sandy beaches on the island, for sunbathing, swimming, or a drink at one of the oceanfront bars. Pick up groceries in the nearby village of Ano Mera, less than 10 minutes away by car, or find a range of shops and restaurants in Mykonos Town, about 25 minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This villa showcases shapes. Here square windows frame the rock the villa rests within and becomes the art. Half-moon archways and windows showcase the views. The magnificent kidney- shaped infinity pool with a rock set in the pool is the center piece of this architecturally impressive villa. Enjoy the birds-eye view of yachts entering and leaving Ornos Bay. The sun sparkles on the sea and the pool. The warm breeze caresses while stretching out on a lounger.Inside the Midas villa is rich with woods and stone, a sleek modern kitchen, many overstuffed seating areas, and a welcoming fireplace for cooler evenings. A thoughtful small library is ready with books. Outside are a large covered barbecue and dining alfresco area, as well as other shaded sitting areas. Midas Villa is refined, sophisticated, and elegant. Late suppers, small cocktail soirees, and afternoon barbecues around the pool with select friends and conversation come to mind.Psarou Beach is very cosmopolitan. Enclosed by mountains, it has clean white sands and emerald water. Comfortable sunbeds and umbrellas dot the beach as do parties and watersports. Many yachts, celebs, and artists make people – watching just that more enjoyable. Just 2.8 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nouvelle finds space atop the hill just to the back of Elia Beach, part of a brand new development of private properties overlooking the fine sand and clear waters of this famous beach on the southeastern side of Mykonos. The location allows for extensive views of the bay and sunshine throughout the day, while being within a short drive from the beach, the perfect distance to either join in on the “fun in the sun” or relax around the property’s private pool.The aforementioned infinity pool catalyzes the outdoor spaces and is placed in the most panoramic part of the terrace. It can be reached both from the front terrace – which is aptly furnished for al fresco dining under a charming pergola – and from the lower level of the property where most of the bedrooms are situated. Stylish furniture is thoughtfully placed throughout while a small, lush garden blooms in the area just below.A great sense of style pervades the interiors of Nouvelle as well. Pure white surfaces dominate all spaces solely interrupted by colorful fittings. A perfect example would be the two living rooms, one per level, each boasting multicolored sitting areas with throw pillows and elegant coffee tables. The same theme is found in the property’s bedrooms, some of which might not have the same view as the others but are all appointed in a stylish manner to assure a chic ambience to all.Nouvelle is a great property to get away from the more busy areas of Mykonos during the crowded summers and cherish moments of relaxation in a refined atmosphere or delve in the beach life of Elia just close by.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved

listing.listing_description: Sitting above Elia Beach, White Star is a brand new private property with a stunning view over the bay that stretches over the turquoise waters of the Aegean Sea. This panoramic location is within a short drive from Elia town as well as the village of Ano Mera. Inhale the sweet fragrance of geraniums mingled with bougainvillea as you coast your way through the sheer white abodes framed in this paradise called Mykonos.A love for the outdoors becomes immediately evident as guests step onto the main terrace of this vacation rental. A private swimming pool with an infinity-edge seems to hover over the sea. You will find a stylish wooden deck on one side of the pool and a well-maintained lawn on the other. A large pergola covers the entertainment and relaxation areas, all equipped with stylish furnishing and the latest technology. Little could compare to the fragrance of your favorite cuts sizzling on the barbeque while you enjoy the fresh sea air. Pull up to the lovely alfresco dining area with a stunning ocean view and feast at your leisure. Wi-Fi and housekeeping are included with your reservation.The internal spaces of White Star represent an architectural dreamscape. Each room features designer furniture and a vibrant mix of white surfaces and colorful accents. The attention to detail showcases a passion for fine seaside living. The villa includes a pull-down movie screen with projector, especially useful for a movie night during the occasional rain shower. High vaulted ceilings and white archways are reminiscent of a more romantic era.Six exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eleven guests at this non-smoking villa. The main house includes four bedrooms. Two separate guest studios, perfect for couples on honeymoon, are located on a lower level. All of the suites include en-suite bathrooms, television and air conditioning. The master suite also has a jetted tub.White Star makes a great bet for guests who cherish great taste while being close to the beach. The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics provide guests of Okyroe with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. The picturesque environs make it perfect for a family holiday, a group of friends or exclusive weddings, birthdays and other special events. Enter an enchanting land where luxury and tradition comingle for an idyllic getaway experience!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Watch as sailboats and luxury yachts navigate Old Harbor at this modern-Cycladic home on the waterfront in Mykonos. Sip your morning espresso at the rustic-chic picnic table on the balcony. At night, move over to the plush bench alongside the fireplace for a glass of wine in the moonlight. Then, stroll inland to find bustling restaurants and cocktail bars lining the streets of Mykonos.The smooth, curvy-lines of Cycladic architecture are sure to soothe the soul at Villa Kampani. The ancient style gets a modern, minimalistic update with the thoughtful addition of floating beds, a built-in sofa, and state of the art kitchen. The wood pieces invite a natural element, bordering on Mid-century modern, but staying true to Greek style. At dinner, you’ll enjoy an ocean view whether you choose to sit inside or out. After, whip up a few ouzotinis and to sip on the balcony.In the morning, start your day with a swim at Agios Stefanos Beach, a crystal-clear cove protected from the winds and safe for the whole family. For a more “adult” beach experience, check out Paradise Beach, lined with bustling bars, generally attracting a younger crowd. It’s also a great place to try scuba diving. If you’re feeling ambitious, hop on a ferry and check out some of the neighboring islands. Or, visit Mikonos’ closer towns, Orno, Psarrou, and Platis Gialos.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Your very own piece of paradise, four-bedroom Villa Lennox resides at the top of a hill offering enchanting vistas over the beaches of Paros and neighboring islands. A striking whitewash building, Villa Lennox contrasts remarkably with the azure sky above. Picturesque farming village Kostos is a short amble, less than half a kilometer, and Ysterni beach is a few minutes away by car.Unwind in luxury around the topaz waters of the pool, enjoying the comfort of the villa’s hot pink loungers or you can spend your days serving aces on the villa’s tennis court. After all the excitement you will have worked up a hunger, so fire up the barbeque for a hearty feast. Enjoy laid-back evening meals under the stars, while settled in the al fresco dining area. A lush hillside dotted with pretty pink flowers will be your backdrop, while to the front you can gaze out to sea. After dinner, pay the wine cellar a visit before heading to the ethereal moonlit terrace. Inside, the games room features a ping-pong table and games console – ideal for evening entertainment.Clean, simple lines within the villa combine with orb shaped lighting to create a Zen-like tranquility. A cooling system under the fine marble floors provides a blissful sanctuary during hot afternoons. The luxury proportions of the lounge mean that the room effortlessly plays host to a capacious and cozy collection of couches, dining table and library zone. The kitchen is a cheerful, summery space, although you might not spend much time in here. Included with the villa is a dedicated cook, serving up delicious meals 6 days a week.Three double and one twin bedrooms are shared over two levels and the guesthouse. The restful rooms carry through the pure white theme from the living area. Offering a dreamlike serenity, you will feel cool and utterly relaxed as you drift off to sleep under soft, white sheets. Awaken to a bright new day feeling fresh and revitalized. Three of the sparkling, modern bathrooms are en-suite, while the other two are shared.Take a gentle stroll to Kostos, a small traditional farming village that, unaffected by tourism, holds its authentic island charm. Explore the narrow paved streets, and visit St. Panteleimonas, a church beautifully representative of local architecture. Afterwards, shade under the trees in the village square as you sip on a coffee from the friendly local café. The transfer to Paros airport is a 16 km drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thatched pergolas frame the sun sinking behind the islands of Delos and Rhenia at this terraced villa on Mykonos. Built into the hillside like a nest, its indoor and outdoor living areas stretch over several levels, creating plenty of private nooks along with spaces for everyone to gather. The nearest beach is Agios Ioannis, whose stretch of sand could be—and was—the setting for a movie. Settle in to sunny days by the infinity pool, sunbeds, shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, and a wood-fired barbecue, all with views of the Aegean’s glittering expanse. After you’ve watched the sunset, have a post-prandial coffee from the Nespresso machine, switch on the satellite TV or Sonos sound system, and post photos from your holiday via Wi-Fi. Classic stone and whitewashed walls evoke the traditional architecture of Greece’s islands, but inside, this vacation rental takes a more modern tack. In the living rooms, sculptural coffee tables sit beside built-in sofas; in the dining room, Wishbone chairs and a banquette seat eight. Though much of it is concealed behind clever fold-away wood paneling, the kitchen is fully equipped. This luxury property has two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with double beds: one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a shared hall bathroom. All four bedrooms have ocean views and air conditioning, and one of the queen bedrooms has its own lounge area and kitchenette, making it ideal for a couple that wants to sneak away for a honeymoon-style escape. The villa’s setting in the Pouli area of Mykonos is just a short drive from Agios Ioannis Beach, a gorgeous stretch where you can build sand castles as a family all day, then pause for a drink at one of the restaurants lining the beach while you watch the sun go down. Get your fill of Greek specialties, from local seafood to moussaka to Myconian honey pie, in Mykonos Town, which is close enough for lunch or dinner. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kymothoe is a spacious oceanfront villa located in the Agios Ioannis area of Mykonos that combines a traditional Greek aesthetic with the finest modern amenities. The property shares a private entrance and parking area with Villa Okyroe and is situated just a few minutes by foot from the secluded sandy beach of Kapari. Experience the Aegean Sea like never before with Luxury Retreats!The grounds at this stunning vacation rental feature a private infinity swimming pool, a garden setting and a shaded pergola. The terrace area around the saltwater pool is equipped with teak deck chairs, an outdoor lounge and large sun beds. You will also find a lovely alfresco dining set for twelve and a barbeque. Wi-Fi and housekeeping are included with your reservation.The bright and elegant living room and oval sitting area are exquisitely furnished with an off-white upholstered day bed, armchair and flowing curtains. Both have access to the swimming pool and overlook the sea. The open plan formal dining space connects with a modern kitchen, an outdoor patio and the barbeque area. The large outdoor dining table by the swimming pool is perfect for all day sea breeze dining.Six delectable bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. Four sleeping quarters are located in the main house, and two in the guest house. Guests will have their choice of double or twin beds. The picturesque location and layout of this villa makes it a great bet for a family holiday or a special event like a wedding or birthday. The guest house provides extra privacy for a couple on honeymoon or any other member of the group who requires more space.Kymothoe offers a peaceful environment in a glamorous, yet laid back solution for family and friends looking to get away to this delightful Mediterranean island. The picturesque views mixed with Cycladic aesthetics and fine amenities provide guests of Kymothoe with an inspiring respite for mind, body and soul. Inhale the sweet fragrance of geraniums mingled with bougainvillea as you coast your way through the sheer white abodes framed by turquoise waters in this Greek paradise called Mykonos!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Brimming with personality, Villa Sullivan huddles into the Parian hillside, overlooking acres of bountiful olive yards. The villas’ enviable position offers views across a landscape dotted with pretty whitewash houses and out to sea, where you will find the island’s miniature neighbor, Antiparos. Just 1km from the villa lies popular Farangas beach. Venture just a little further for quaint fishing villages Ageria and Aliki.Cozily tucked among higgledy dry-stone walls and native plants, sits a comfy outdoor couch paired with a well-placed coffee table. Here you will find a little pocket of peace with postcard views, perfect for a laid back breakfast.Feel like you are floating above the hillside on the poolside loungers, as you soak up the Grecian sun. There’s equal opportunity for shade under the protective pergola. Enjoy social gatherings around the outdoor lounge, ideal for a daytime refreshment break, or enjoying a moonlit nightcap. Take advantage of the balmy evenings for al fresco dinners with panoramic vistas – colorful sunsets come as a welcome bonus with dessert. A delightful blend of traditional Cycladian architecture and uplifting colorful accents, the living room is an upbeat space, rich in character. Enjoy group meals under the pastel shades of the chandelier, and make a toast to your dream vacation. Connecting the villa’s two wings is a long window fronted corridor, a soothing spot to curl up with a book. The kitchen emanates a sophisticated image, with sleek black units, making your meal preparation a pleasure. There is also the option to pre-arrange your own private cook.Choose from four double bedrooms and a twin, each with their own lovely en-suite bathroom. Each en-suite features soft curved surfaces and nature inspired colors to create a space that delivers far beyond its basic function. The bedrooms have a ‘beachy’ feel, guaranteed to bring a smile to your face when you open your eyes each morning. The double rooms all enjoy access to a sea-view terrace, so you need only take a couple of steps before encountering the gentle warmth of the morning sun.Characterful fishing village Aliki is just a few minutes from Villa Sullivan. Along the main boulevard, you will encounter independent shops, friendly cafes and lively tavernas serving up freshly caught seafood and local delicacies. Wander around the harbor’s edge and see if you can spot the traditional Greek fishing boats called ‘Kaikis.’ The village is known for its three beaches, lined by tamarix trees and celebrated as the most beautiful stretches of sand on the island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Flooded with brilliant Aegean sunlight, villa Witt stands simple and serene above the quaint town of Naoussa and the gorgeous stretch of Kolimbithres Beach. From its sea views and relaxed outdoor living spaces to its charming whitewashed walls and stylish, comfortable interiors, this luxury Paros vacation rental brings you the best of the Greek islands. Invite up to ten friends or family members for a sun-kissed getaway to this idyllic five-bedroom retreat.A garden dotted with flowering shrubs and vines forms the backdrop to the villa’s sunny terraces. For those who want to bask, there are plenty of lounge chairs looking out to sea; for those who want a bit of shade, there are pergola-covered sitting and dining areas, and a curved pool. An outdoor kitchen with a barbecue lets you dine like the locals on fresh seafood, and the house’s Wi-Fi lets you share photos of your trip with friends back home.The bright, open-plan interiors of Witt are a beautiful mix of traditional influences and modern style. Whitewashed walls and beamed ceilings in the living room let light bounce around the space, a stone wall in the dining area is a nod to the island’s historic architecture and tile floors throughout are a cool respite if you’ve been on the hot sands of the beach all day. Slipcovered sofas and a built-in banquette in the dining area are quietly inviting, and there’s an equally welcoming breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.The mix of old and new continues in the villa’s five bedrooms, with whitewashed walls, pretty quilts on the beds and the occasional geometric side table for a bit of edge. There are two bedrooms with double bed and en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, two bedrooms with double beds and shared bathrooms, and one bedroom with two twin beds and a shared bathroom.While Witt is the perfect private haven to escape from it all, it’s well worth exploring the island of Paros during your holiday. Discover a favorite cove at Kolimbithres Beach, 2.5 km away, join the couples on honeymoon for a romantic dinner at an oceanfront restaurant in Naoussa, 2.5 km away, or revel in the traditional cobbled streets and lively nightlife in Parikia, 8 km away. When it’s time to leave, you can catch a ferry back to the Greek mainland or take a flight from Paros National Airport, 18 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: White reflects the sun’s heat on this villa on the edge of Ornos Bay with its rustic stone and whitewash both inside and out. Warm breezes also help to cool while lounging on the terrace of the infinity pool and watching the ocean beneath your feet. A dip in the pool visually plays with you to make it seem like swimming in the bay.Inside is an elegant study in white too. Beamed ceilings, arches, and windows look out to the bay from almost every room. Shady and cool with overstuffed couches and sitting areas, it’s a brief getaway from the sun. Horatia outcrops and overhangs Ornos Bay, offering birdseye views 24/7. Yoga at sunrise on this terrace seems just that more special. Evening cocktails and late suppers with the sound of the sea and the beauty of the villa’s soft lights is impressive.Horatia is pet-friendly and digitally connected. The Concierge here is a miracle worker getting the best reservations to most restaurants with little waiting, even Scorpios. It’s 4 km to charming Mykonos Town for shopping therapy or clubbing. Psarou Beach is a few minutes away with its powdery beach and is a big draw for water sports.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
